name: Association des Americains Accidentels
goal:
L'Association des Américains Accidentels (AAA) a pour objet de défendre les intérêts des binationaux franco-américains, résidant hors des Etats-Unis, contre l'extraterritorialité de la législation américaine.

Nous nous battons plus particulièrement pour défendre les "Américains accidentels" contre le Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (FATCA) et contre le principe de la Citizenship Based Taxation (CBT) pratiqué par les Etats-Unis.
interests: Banking and financial services, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Study of the Policy Department C, “FATCA Legislation and its Application at International
and EU Level;”

Question for oral answer on the adverse effects of FATCA on EU citizens (O-000053/2018);

Resolution on the adverse effects of FATCA on EU citizens and in particular ‘accidental
Americans’ (2018/2646(RSP));

Hearing “FATCA and its extraterritorial impact on EU citizens”
